## Les bases - Figures {.smaller auto-animate="true"}
``` r

ggplot(mpg, aes(x = hwy, y = cty, color = cyl)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 2) + scale_color_viridis_c(option = ‘’E’’) + theme_minimal()

```
